channel.title: Some errors
channel.description:
If there's a shorter way I can write this, please tell me. This code I'm trying to put in NPCHandler.java is giving me 3 errors, and I can't find what the problem is though.
[code] if(npcs[i].npcType == 2591) ||
npcs[i].npcType == 2598 || npcs[i].npcType ==
2592 || npcs[i].npcType == 2593 || npcs[i].npcType
== 2594 || npcs[i].npcType == 2595 ||
npcs[i].npcType == 2596 || npcs[i].npcType ==
2597 || npcs[i].npcType == 2598 || npcs[i].npcType
== 2599 || npcs[i].npcType == 2600 ||
npcs[i].npcType == 2601 || npcs[i].npcType ==
2602 || npcs[i].npcType == 2603 || npcs[i].npcType
== 2604 || npcs[i].npcType == 2605 ||
npcs[i].npcType == 2606 || npcs[i].npcType ==
2607 || npcs[i].npcType == 2608 || npcs[i].npcType
== 2609 || npcs[i].npcType == 2610 ||
npcs[i].npcType == 2611 || npcs[i].npcType ==
2612 || npcs[i].npcType == 2613 || npcs[i].npcType
== 2614 || npcs[i].npcType == 2615 ||
npcs[i].npcType == 2616 || npcs[i].npcType ==
2624 || npcs[i].npcType == 2625; { // Tzhaar if(misc.random(4) > 1) { ItemHandler.addItem(6529, npcs[NPCID].absX,
npcs[NPCID].absY, 50, GetNpcKiller(NPCID),
false); } else { ItemHandler.addItem(6529, npcs[NPCID].absX,
npcs[NPCID].absY, 75, GetNpcKiller(NPCID),
false); } } [/code]
[code] NPCHandler.java:1499: not a statement else (npcs[i].npcType == 2591) || npcs[i].npcType == 2598 || npcs[i].npcType = = 2592 || npcs[i].npcType == 2593 || npcs[i].npcType == 2594 || npcs[i].npcType == 2595 || npcs[i].npcType == 2596 || npcs[i].npcType == 2597 || npcs[i].npcType == 2598 || npcs[i].npcType == 2599 || npcs[i].npcType == 2600 || npcs[i].npcTyp e == 2601 || npcs[i].npcType == 2602 || npcs[i].npcType == 2603 || npcs[i].npcTy pe == 2604 || npcs[i].npcType == 2605 || npcs[i].npcType == 2606 || npcs[i].npcT ype == 2607 || npcs[i].npcType == 2608 || npcs[i].npcType == 2609 || npcs[i].npc Type == 2610 || npcs[i].npcType == 2611 || npcs[i].npcType == 2612 || npcs[i].np cType == 2613 || npcs[i].npcType == 2614 || npcs[i].npcType == 2615 || npcs[i].n pcType == 2616 || npcs[i].npcType == 2624 || npcs[i].npcType == 2625; { // Tzhaa r
^ NPCHandler.java:1506: 'else' without 'if' else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 2572)// kolodion with ring ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
It's probably something very simple, but any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Some errors
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

If there’s a shorter way I can write this, please tell me. This code I’m trying to put in NPCHandler.java is giving me 3 errors, and I can’t find what the problem is though.

if(npcs[i].npcType == 2591)  || 

npcs[i].npcType == 2598  || npcs[i].npcType == 

2592 || npcs[i].npcType == 2593 || npcs[i].npcType 

== 2594 || npcs[i].npcType == 2595 || 

npcs[i].npcType == 2596 || npcs[i].npcType == 

2597 || npcs[i].npcType == 2598 || npcs[i].npcType 

== 2599 || npcs[i].npcType == 2600 || 

npcs[i].npcType == 2601 || npcs[i].npcType == 

2602 || npcs[i].npcType == 2603 || npcs[i].npcType 

== 2604 || npcs[i].npcType == 2605 || 

npcs[i].npcType == 2606 || npcs[i].npcType == 

2607 || npcs[i].npcType == 2608 || npcs[i].npcType 

== 2609 || npcs[i].npcType == 2610 || 

npcs[i].npcType == 2611 || npcs[i].npcType == 

2612 || npcs[i].npcType == 2613 || npcs[i].npcType 

== 2614 || npcs[i].npcType == 2615 || 

npcs[i].npcType == 2616 || npcs[i].npcType == 

2624 || npcs[i].npcType == 2625; { // Tzhaar
if(misc.random(4) > 1) {
ItemHandler.addItem(6529, npcs[NPCID].absX, 

npcs[NPCID].absY, 50, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), 

false);
} else {
ItemHandler.addItem(6529, npcs[NPCID].absX, 

npcs[NPCID].absY, 75, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), 

false);
}
}
NPCHandler.java:1499: not a statement
else (npcs[i].npcType == 2591)  || npcs[i].npcType == 2598  || npcs[i].npcType =
= 2592 || npcs[i].npcType == 2593 || npcs[i].npcType == 2594 || npcs[i].npcType
== 2595 || npcs[i].npcType == 2596 || npcs[i].npcType == 2597 || npcs[i].npcType
 == 2598 || npcs[i].npcType == 2599 || npcs[i].npcType == 2600 || npcs[i].npcTyp
e == 2601 || npcs[i].npcType == 2602 || npcs[i].npcType == 2603 || npcs[i].npcTy
pe == 2604 || npcs[i].npcType == 2605 || npcs[i].npcType == 2606 || npcs[i].npcT
ype == 2607 || npcs[i].npcType == 2608 || npcs[i].npcType == 2609 || npcs[i].npc
Type == 2610 || npcs[i].npcType == 2611 || npcs[i].npcType == 2612 || npcs[i].np
cType == 2613 || npcs[i].npcType == 2614 || npcs[i].npcType == 2615 || npcs[i].n
pcType == 2616 || npcs[i].npcType == 2624 || npcs[i].npcType == 2625; { // Tzhaa
r









                                                             ^
NPCHandler.java:1506: 'else' without 'if'
else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 2572)//
 kolodion with ring
^

It’s probably something very simple, but any help would be appreciated.
